akn:content.akn:p: To establish criteria for determining when an applicant has, pursuant to section 6 of the Pistols and Other Dangerous Weapons Act [ยง 22-4506]:
To establish the type and amount of ammunition that may be carried concealed by a licensee;
To establish the methods by which a pistol may be carried, including any standards for safe holstering;
To establish all application forms, investigation procedures, background checks, and fees necessary to process an application for a license to carry a concealed pistol;
To specify any procedures or requirements specific to non-residents who apply to carry a concealed pistol pursuant to ยง 22-4506, with regard to the registration requirements in this unit;
To specify requirements for signage on any private premises where the owner or person in control of the premises prohibits the carrying of a concealed pistol pursuant to ยง 7-2509.07(b); and
To establish procedures for the renewal of licenses.
